PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-00572019-01-31
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of BRUCE P. MANION of Fall River, Nova Scotia, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Troy Myers, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
